positive_comments: Some Dumbass tripped over the bench, you yoinked {thing} out of their pockets
The gavel fell and knocked some sense into them. You picked up the pieces and got {thing}!
They finally made a decision without a recess. You grabbed their discarded lunch money and got {thing}. What a Sucker
A justice lost their robe in a heated debate. You sold it on eBay and got {thing}. What a Deal!
Someone actually read the Constitution today. You found their forgotten glasses and got {thing} for them.
negative_comments: You tried to argue a case but got laughed out of court. Tough luck. You lost {thing} in legal fees.
You attempted to bribe a justice. It didn't go well. You had to pay {thing} so you didnt go to jail.
You fell asleep during a hearing and missed your chance to grab something valuable. You lost {thing} in court fees.
You accidentally insulted a justice. You were thrown out. You lost {thing} in the medical fees.
You tried to understand the legalese and ended up with a headache. Not your best day. You lost {thing} in medical fees.
death_comments: You tried to steal a justice's gavel and got caught. The bailiffs weren't gentle, and you didn't survive the encounter. Oops.
You got lost in the labyrinthine court building and starved to death. Better luck next time.
You tried to sneak into the judge's chambers and got trapped. You didn't survive the experience. Oops.
You mistook the court for a basketball court and tried a slam dunk. The fall was fatal. Oops.
You tried to play lawyer but ended up getting sentenced to death for contempt of court. Yikes.

positive_comments: You found some spare change under the seat, adding {thing} to your wallet.
You found a valuable object someone left behind, selling it gave you {thing}.
You found a wallet in the glove box. Sweet! You got {thing}.
You found a rare car part. You sold it for {thing}.
You found a diamond ring in the ashtray. After selling it, you got {thing}.
negative_comments: The car alarm went off and you had to run away, dropping {thing} in the process.
You cut yourself on broken glass, resulting in a trip to the hospital and a loss of {thing}.
You accidentally triggered the airbag while searching. The resulting chaos cost you {thing}.
You attracted the attention of a police officer and had to pay a fine of {thing}.
The car was a complete junker, and you got nothing but a tetanus shot that cost {thing}.
death_comments: You accidentally locked yourself in the trunk and couldn't get out. You didn't survive. Oops.
You tried hot-wiring the car and electrocuted yourself. You didn't make it.
You didn't notice the car was perched on the edge of a cliff. It rolled over with you inside. Yikes.
While looking under the car, it collapsed on you. You didn't survive. Oops.
You were mistaken for a car thief and shot. Better luck next time.

positive_comments: You found a forgotten bank note on the floor, adding {thing} to your wallet.
You helped a customer and they tipped you {thing}.
You found a misplaced bag of coins. You took {thing} out of it.
You found a rare coin in the coin counting machine. You sold it for {thing}.
You found a forgotten safety deposit box key. After some sleuthing, you got {thing}.
negative_comments: You accidentally set off the bank alarm and had to pay a fine of {thing}.
You tried to help a customer but ended up causing a mess, costing you {thing} in damages.
You got caught in a bank audit and had to pay {thing} in fees.
You accidentally locked yourself in the vault and had to pay {thing} for a locksmith.
You tried to play banker but ended up losing {thing} in a bad investment.
death_comments: You got trapped in the vault and ran out of air. You didn't survive. Oops.
You were mistaken for a bank robber and shot by security. Better luck next time.
You tried to lift a heavy bag of coins and dropped it on yourself. The injury was fatal. Oops.
You got caught in a bank robbery and didn't make it out. Yikes.
You tried to play hero during a bank heist and got shot. Better luck next time.

positive_comments: You found a forgotten tax return and got {thing} from it.
You helped someone with their taxes and they tipped you {thing}.
You found a loophole in the tax code and earned {thing}.
You audited a big corporation and got {thing} as a reward.
You found an unclaimed tax refund and got {thing}.
negative_comments: You got audited and had to pay {thing} in back taxes.
You made a mistake on a tax return and had to pay {thing} as a penalty.
You lost a tax evasion case and had to pay {thing}.
You got caught in a tax fraud scheme and lost {thing}.
You misplaced important tax documents and had to pay {thing} to replace them.
death_comments: You got caught in a dangerous tax evasion scheme and didn't survive.
You angered a powerful corporation with your audits and they had you eliminated.
You tried to steal confidential tax documents and were caught by security.
You got lost in the labyrinthine IRS building and starved.
You were crushed by a mountain of paperwork.

positive_comments: You managed to trick a demon and stole {thing} from it.
You found a lost soul who gave you {thing} for guiding it to the light.
You stumbled upon a hidden treasure chest in the underworld and found {thing}.
You won a bet against a devil and earned {thing}.
You found {thing} in the remains of a demonic ritual.
negative_comments: A demon caught you snooping around and took {thing} as a penalty.
You got lost in the labyrinth of torment and had to pay {thing} to a guide.
You accidentally stepped into a circle of summoning and lost {thing} in the ensuing chaos.
You tried to outsmart a devil but ended up losing {thing}.
You were chased by hellhounds and dropped {thing} while escaping.
death_comments: You were caught in a demonic crossfire and didn't survive.
You fell into the river Styx and drowned.
You were trapped in a torture chamber and didn't make it out.
You were turned into a stone statue by a gorgon.
You were swallowed by a hellish beast.
